item.description:
Our next evening meet up will be at Borders Books store in downtown boston. from 6:30 to 8:30PM. Food and drinks available here.

Take the T to downtown boston, www.mbta.com.

Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group. All levels are welcome.

We'd really like to make this meetup work for you. Please feel free to take our survey and share your thoughts: Click here to take Survey:

We will not be there if no one RSVP yes, and we will only wait 15 mins if no one show up. please RSVP responsibly because we donate our time for helping all of you study. thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the cafe, I will have sign up!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Wednesday evening chinese/english language exchange group
